lead_paragraph: New Jersey City University men’s basketball Coach Charles Brown announced his retirement yesterday, ending a 25-year tenure in which his teams won nearly 500 games and twice reached the N.C.A.A. Division III national semifinals. His retirement takes effect Sept. 30.
